product_name: The North Face Better Than Naked Shorts - Men's
long_description: The North Face Better Than Naked shorts pack a ton of distance-ready features into a lightweight pair of running shorts. Ripstop polyester is used to create soft and flowing outer shorts; polyester panels add to their breathability. Ventilation areas are positioned to reduce clamminess and vent warm air. A continuous seamless short liner made of polyester is wrapped into the waistband. FlashDry(TM) fibers in shorts liner dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Fabric helps protect from too much UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. No inseam on shorts means virtually no chafing while you run. Small pockets in the rear center of the waistband provide a place to carry energy gels or some cash. The North Face Better Than Naked shorts feature reflective logos to increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: The North Face Better Than Naked shorts pack a ton of distance-ready features into a lightweight pair of running shorts.
